Key Match Events: Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Bucks' comeback with a strong second half performance.
Gary Trent Jr. hit two clutch three-pointers late in the game.
Post-Match Reflections: The Bucks overcame a 19-point deficit after halftime to secure the win.
The Pacers struggled with a blown lead at home.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Gainbridge Fieldhouse in Indianapolis with an attendance of 17,274.
